doc.field: South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums
South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums

The South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums date from circa 1850 to 1922 and contain 52 items. The albums are composed of cabinet card portraits of bank trustees, many of whom are identified on album pages. In addition, each volume contains a name index.

The South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums date from circa 1850 to 1922 and contain 52 items. The albums are composed of cabinet card portraits of bank trustees, many of whom are identified on album pages. In addition, each volume contains a name index.

The South Brooklyn Savings Institution trustees portrait albums date from circa 1850 to 1922 and contain 52 items. The albums are composed of cabinet card portraits of bank trustees, many of whom are identified on album pages. In addition, each volume contains a name index.
Source and date of acquisition for this collection are unknown.
